post:
Hello all,

First there was minikvm.com, maxikvm.com, powerkvm.com and gamekvm.com. Now there is also storagekvm.com.

Not all of us need superfast and expensive NVMe storage. Sometimes SATA storage is just good enough to store pictures, videos etc. At storagekvm.com we are running RAID10 setups based on FreeBSD/ZFS mirrored storage with redundant SSD caching. So a high-capacity fully redundant storage solution that still performs like it should.

What you get with this offer:

KVM VPS with Virtualizor control panel.
1 vCPU Xeon Silver 4214 (Fair share CPU usage)
512 MB up to 2048 MB dedicated RAM (configurable)
100 GB up to 1 TB RAID10 SATA storage.
2 GBps down / 2 GBps upload (Shared)
1TB/2TB/4TB traffic (configurable) - Capped to 10 mbit unlimited when fully used.
Location: Frankfurt, Germany.
OS: Most Linux distros. Any ISO on request (No Windows on storage plans).
1x IPv4 address
1x /80 IPv6 subnet
Fully managable DDoS Protection (+Discord/E-mail attack notifications).
Instant setup. (Depending on stock and fraud check - Please use valid info and no VPN).
30-day no questions asked money back guarantee.

These specs min € 21 each year! (depending on configuration) plus VAT (if you’re from Europe).

Any custom plans available with ticket. If you need more storage or some non-standard setup just open a ticket and we'll get you sorted.

Check out https://storagekvm.com for more info and ordering.

Make sure to read the ToS before you order: https://minikvm.com/terms-of-service/
Network info and test: https://minikvm.com/network/
Most asked questions: https://minikvm.com/faq/

Any questions? Reply here or visit our Livechat on our website, sent us an email or use our Telegram support! (see below for phone number).

We accept Paypal, Credit Card, iDEAL, Bancontact, Sofort, Paysafecard, Bitcoin and Giropay. For other payment options please contact us at sales@minikvm.com

Our company info:

NOVOS BV. We’re a company located in Belgium
You can find our company info here: https://kbopub.economie.fgov.be/kbopub/toonondernemingps.html?ondernemingsnummer=728513847
